mapper.insert: insert into job (cst_create, cst_modified, name, job_position, start_time, end_time, max_job) values (current_timestamp(), current_timestamp(), #{name}, #{jobPosition}, #{startTime}, #{startTime}, #{maxJob});
mapper.update: update job set name = #{name}, job_position = #{jobPosition}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, max_job = #{maxJob}, cst_modified = current_timestamp() where id = #{id} and is_deleted = false;
